By  NICOLE SOSZYNSKINovember  

Four NIU students took top honors in the Chipotle Mexican Grills National Student Advertising Contest PERIOD

The NIU team which won on the strength of its entry Just the Fax will split the firstplace prize of  with a student team from Chapman University PERIOD On top of that NIU will receive  from Chipotle as well said Laura Vazquez associate professor in the department of communication and the head of the NIU Student Film and Video Association PERIOD

The students who produced the video ad were Chris Darkes of Schaumburg Brittany Samson of Huntley Sara Honchar of Freeport and Joe Giorgi of Rockford PERIOD The ad was for Chipotles  Seconds of Fame contest PERIOD

Its exciting PERIOD I never really earned something before said Samson a senior communication media major PERIOD After we heard we were going to Chipotle for lunch to celebrate. vazquez said the team deserved to win for the amount of hard work and creativity involved in producing the ad PERIOD

I am thrilled to have very talented and creative students Vazquez said PERIOD

Two teams of NIU students made the top  of the competition Vazquez said PERIOD Eighty schools participated and two teams from each school were allowed to enter said Darkes a senior communication media studies major PERIOD

Darkes who said he created the idea for Just the Fax said it came to him in a dream PERIOD

In this lucid dream where everything just really meshed together the idea came to me Darkes said PERIOD

The students divided into teams and developed their own storyboards Vazquez said PERIOD

Seeing the end result was a satisfying experience Samson said PERIOD

I think it is really awesome to see something that you did get recognition she said PERIOD

Darkes said the competition will help prove to future employers that the next generation can hold its own in the advertising business PERIOD

Its an excellent opportunity for corporations and companies to see how much talent and creativity there is out there Darkes said PERIOD
